article.title: Status and history for por_PT
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: Replaced the text with that of Portuguese government (at http://www.portugal.gov.pt/pt/GC18/Portugal/SistemaPolitico/dudh/Pages/DeclaracaoUniversaldosDireitosHumanos.aspx); thanks to Miguel Sousa for providing it.
spelling correction: replaced "Homen" by "Homem"; promotion to stage 7. Thanks to Leandro Reis for the proofreading.
renamed to port_PT, to make room for the por_BR translation.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
